    • createState

      public AdventureCardState createState(Game game)
      Description copied from class: AdventureCard
      Creates the state associated with the adventure card.
      Specified by:
      createState in class AdventureCard
      Parameters:
      game - the game instance that provides the context for the adventure card state
      Returns:

    • drawContent

      void drawContent(StringBuilder sb)
      Draws the content of the Smugglers adventure card into the provided StringBuilder. The method appends various card details such as required firepower, lost goods, earned boxes, and lost flight days.
      Overrides:
      drawContent in class AdventureCard
      Parameters:
      sb - the StringBuilder instance where the formatted card content will be appended

    • renderBoxes

      public String renderBoxes()
      Renders the obtained resources as a formatted string
      Returns:
